website_summaries.verdict: A well-rounded tire for all-around use that operates well on dirt, gravel, rock, mud, water, and any other slop that the vehicle may encounter.
pros: Offers impeccable control, rides smoothly and quietly, and is one of the least expensive investments that you can make
Offers a solid ride across a multitude of applications
cons: We couldn't find any considerable drawbacks to this tire

customer_reviews.title: Daily use at horse facility
customer_reviews.text: These went on a Honda Foreman 500 that is used every day at a horse facility. They encounter deep sand, snow, mud, grass, gravel, wood shavings, and even poo. All while pulling an arena drag, hay wagon or manure spreader. They are the perfect mix of a paddle tire for mud and sand, and a directional tread for everything else. They self clean quite well and resist mud clogging. They were a bit of a pain for the tire guys, as they did not want to seat on the rim. They could be a wheel related problem though. Almost no comparison the the Maxxis tires Honda installs at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: FJR1300

customer_reviews.title: Short Shipped Order
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item specifically because it had quantities "ready to ship". I actually wanted another tire which was a better price but there was only one in-stock so I ordered these instead so I would be certain to get two before I ship out for work again. Today I received one of the two tires I paid for - the other has not even shipped. Thanks - my project and timeline are now both ruined. Tire quality is average but DO NOT trust this company to have the item in-stock even when they say they do and you cannot depend on their ship dates at all. POOR!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Really good performance, but....
customer_reviews.text: The tires have performed well so far on the front of my '08 Honda Rancher. Grip well in dirt and mud, and they handle well on the blacktop when headed down the road to the next gate. Price was fair, but they'll probably lose a sale when I buy rear tires. The 25x10-11 for the rear cost $30 more EACH. Splain that one Lucy....
customer_reviews.author: El Oso

customer_reviews.title: these are 10 times better than original tires
customer_reviews.text: kawasaki mule 610 4x4, these are 10 times better than original tires. The front tires will be 1" shorter and 1" wider than original but they work and look way better. Ruts won't pull the steering wheel out of your hand anymore. Softer ride and I've been driving where I shredded a bunch of locust trees with no leaks I guess the 6 ply is way tougher than the original 4 ply. Plus the yellow bear claw symbol on the tires match the yellow mule symbol on the body. My Mule is a 2005, if I buy a new one I will change the tires the first week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tread for all conditions, great versatility and prices.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tire for any 4x4 quad. I used this as a matching set for a Yamaha Kodiak 4x4 and couldn't be happier with the price or tread pattern. Excellent grip in all conditions and not too wobbly on the street. I never recommend using these on pavement because they are NOT designed for on-road driving at all. These are made for trails, mud, snow, and back country. Get a set for your 4-wheeler and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Open and honest reviewer.

customer_reviews.title: Good tires, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great tires, no nonsense fast delivery. My atv tires got punctured in a cut sapling Forest. Got these mounted by Walmart for 10 bucks for both tires with new stems! Yes Walmart will mount Your atv tires in the auto Center!! Great looking and functional, at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Unprofessional
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 front and 2 rear tires. They came in with different colored letters. Seems pretty unprofessional to not be able to send matching tires I can return them, but they cannot choose what tire I get because the upc is the same. According to them Back they go!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great for my lawn tractor
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to mount on my lawntractor so I could get better traction with loads and in the woods. I've carried up to a 300 lb load on them and backed up a steep hill without a hint of a spin. I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: PA Barns

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional do-it-all ATV tire!
customer_reviews.text: We installed the Kenda bear claw K299's on the rear of my son's 1994 Honda TRX300EX. The value/great price is amazing, they look amazing, and the traction is first class. We've tested them in dry conditions, water, mud, and up to a foot deep in snow and his quad goes through it all with no issues. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: CES

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order if you spend much time on the road
customer_reviews.text: I felt like these were a good deal until they wore completely out in less than a year. Don’t order these if you drive on the road with any frequency.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Skelton

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement for a stock Arctic Cat tire and this works perfect. Tread design is even similar. Will be buying more when the atv needs a complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tire for my Kawasaki KLF300
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my old '94 Kawasaki KLF 300 quad. Local tire shop was able to mount them on the stock rims without a problem. They just fit, I wouldn't go any bigger without putting a lift kit on the quad LOL. They made the quad sit up a little taller and give it a more aggressive stance. They get good traction and turn good too. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Bye

customer_reviews.title: Beast!
customer_reviews.text: Have these tires on three of my families ATVs and we couldn't be happier! They are great in the snow and ice and light mud, and you can still slip them on dry ground if you want to toss around the rear of the quad. Tons of grip! Haven't had them in DEEP mud as all my quads are only RWD.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hartmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Good tires low price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace worn out Super Swampers. Great tread at a fraction of the cost. Tires need to be warm before installation and using a block of wood to separate the beads from each other helps
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Just what my kid wanted.
customer_reviews.text: My kid wanted these for her birthday, she loves them. They do make the ride a little rougher and louder on the pavement but my kid loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Tfroggy

customer_reviews.title: Great tire, bad seller and condition of received item
customer_reviews.text: Great tire BUT beware the tire may come so mangled from the warehouse and shipping it may be impossible to seat the bead, when the two I ordered arrived they were strapped so tightly for so long one tire became deformed. The first tire went easy with a compressor, the second took around 20 tries with a cheetah bead seater at 160psi even when it finally seated I had to redo it because the deformation prevented it from searing evenly , with I could get a refund I fear I may have to order another
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How NOT to ship tires!
customer_reviews.text: Product is for rear of Honda Pioneer. Kenda is good tire, these not my first. Amazon presses two tires together to form one (more or less). This practice SUCKS. Good for Amazon, ignores customer. SUX !!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey osteen

customer_reviews.title: They look great. Can't wait to plow some snow with them
customer_reviews.text: They look great. Can't wait to plow some snow with them. Tire shop had a hard time getting the back bead to set all the way. He tried several times. They didn't leak but they didn't set flush. But it was in the 30 deg temp range. I took them home and put the propane heater and they set better. They have a strong bead on them. I like that, they won't pop off when I hit rocks. 2004 600 Polaris. I beat the hell out of that thing and it keeps on going.
customer_reviews.author: KIM FELDT

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for snow and gravel
customer_reviews.text: I love these tires but sad I had to have them mounted by a tire shop (extra cost) because they were still compressed from shipment from overseas and I could not get the bead to seat myself
customer_reviews.author: Just another frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good tire but the shipper tied two tires together so ...
customer_reviews.text: Good tire but the shipper tied two tires together so tightly they were badly deformed and the tire shop had a real problem mounting and getting to inflate. LOTS of swearing from my tire guy.
customer_reviews.author: sci-fi reader

customer_reviews.title: Deformed tires
customer_reviews.text: Tires come crushed and deformed and are a super pain in the ass to mount. You have to leave them in the sun for a free days before you can attempt to mount them.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco

customer_reviews.title: 1985 Honda 250SX ATC
customer_reviews.text: First, I changed the front wheel from a 8" tall rim to a 12" tall rim after I found the rim I needed with the correct offset, it had a old tire on it, rode it a few minutes to be sure this was what I wanted, then I purchased the Kenda Bearclaw K299 ATV Tire -26X9-12, after mounting and then going for a 15 mile ride mud and trail, I am very happy with the tire, thinking about doing the other 3 wheeler front end the same soon, great tire good price, works great for a 3 wheeler front tire
customer_reviews.author: Flowers Cove

customer_reviews.title: Great in snow
customer_reviews.text: Awesome in the snow. Made a huge difference in my ATV for plowing. I’ll be interested in seeing how long they last, but they’re great so far. The only downer is that they smash them together to package, so they aren’t the same height on the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Whip

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit,, easy to put on rims and on atv...
customer_reviews.text: these tires fit perfect on my Suzuki Eiger 4x4, with lots of tread,much happy with them, and was very easy for me to put on my atv......very much pleased....thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Utv
customer_reviews.text: Quality tires, I put them on my utv, fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Jingbo

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Speedy delivery. Exactly as described. Great traction. And smoother on trails and pavement compared to the mudlites these tires replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Guning

customer_reviews.title: seems to work just fine
customer_reviews.text: going good - been using for a few months still looks new
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great tires installed 2 sets on 610 mules at the farm awesome tire for the money
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Tires!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on a 1996 Honda Four-Trax and they made the bike look like I put a lift-kit on it. My daughter loves them and I love the security of the extra ply that each tire has compared to what I had before. Great tires!
customer_reviews.author: Mongoose

customer_reviews.title: Tire Blew Up!
customer_reviews.text: These so called brand new tires blew up while being mounted! Very dangerous, could have hurt someone. I will be asking for my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It was aggressive but tread has hollow center so tires wear very fast I don’t recommend unless u want to change frequently lasted about a month around farm.
customer_reviews.author: beth harrison

customer_reviews.title: This tire is awesome
customer_reviews.text: What and UTV Tire. This is great Tire. Great price. Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires, good price
customer_reviews.text: Replaced two of original tires on UTV and had these put on our rims at a VIP auto place. They said it was a difficult job but they are on and working just fine. Good price too compared with dealers, they rip you off.
customer_reviews.author: Moose Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Great tires.
customer_reviews.text: I use my quad all the time in the woods here in pa. I was surprised how well they did in the mud. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: buzz

customer_reviews.title: Good tires.
customer_reviews.text: Needed these for our Kawasaki Mule. They are exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my Kawasaki Mule 4010 Trans
customer_reviews.text: Works way better than the stock tires that came on the Kawasaki Mule 4010 Trans
customer_reviews.author: James Andrew Johnston

customer_reviews.title: ATV tires
customer_reviews.text: A very nice set of tires. Very aggressive! Arrived when they said they would!
customer_reviews.author: ChippyC

customer_reviews.title: Killer!
customer_reviews.text: The two tires were shipped kinda weird being compressed into one another, so I was afraid of mounting difficulties. However, they went right on the rim with no problems and I've been cutting through dirt/mud every since. Great tires for the money. I'll definitely be ordering rear tires to match.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Performs great on trails, dirt rds and deep mud. Packing was as other people have stated. 2 tires compressed so much that they form a cup but sitting on the deck for a couple of days in the sun softened them up. Didn't have any trouble mounting them on the rims.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri b

customer_reviews.title: Will buy these again.
customer_reviews.text: I installed these on an ATV of mine they look good and fit. Good Traction in the mud and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tires!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived faster than expected, mounted up with minimal effort(thanx youtube!). 25x12.5x10(rear) 25x8x10(front)mounted them on my original rims. Hardest part was breaking the beads on the rears, took them to 2 tire shops and an atv shop. Wound up cutting them off.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for rocky terrain
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped for a little more durability. These were purchased for a 2018 Polaris Ranger Crew. After two weeks of use on a dirt road they are showing severe wear. We will be lucky to get a few months out of them. They may be good in other conditions but I would not recommend them for hard dirt or rocky conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These tires are great. As other stated
customer_reviews.text: These tires are great. As other stated, packaging for shipping was a little sketchy, but it's not like they were actually damaged. They went on the rim fine and hold air fine. They have nice aggressive tread and work well for the application.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Kenda Bearclaw K299 ATV Tire
customer_reviews.text: These are great tires with aggressive tread pattern. Really made the ride so much better. Great job of quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a 98 Kawasaki Bayou 300. Fit great and have nice, aggressive treat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tires are a great price and have great traction
customer_reviews.text: Tires are a great price and have great traction. The only thing I would say is that they should figure out a different way to package them to ship. The tires were crushed down for shipping but not the correct way. I use to mount tires at a shop and they need to compress one at a time first.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time only wish that it was packed the ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time only wish that it was packed the way it was. Took whole day in sun to unfold and tire changer had hard time installing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like these tires
customer_reviews.text: I like these tires. Got them two days early. Took them out for my deer hunt and really abused them. They held up in rocks, mud, and sand. 7 days of beating the crap out of them and no wear yet I was very supprised no rock rash. An all around great tire. 27's cleared very nice on my ranger with a two inch lift.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for the cost, will definitely look into the again in the future. They do ride a little rougher than the old tires but I think the tread is a bit more aggressive as well so to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great tire at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great tire at a great price. The same tires at my local dealer were $120.00 more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and aggressive tread.
customer_reviews.text: Price was right and good fit on my 89 trail boss. A little tough to get seated on the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Ldub

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these tires but I learned that going from ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these tires but I learned that going from the standard 8" to this 9" caused me to also have to purchase front wheel spacers as these tires rubbed against the tie rods on my 2014 Polaris Ranger mid-size. Looking forward to trying them out in the snow!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R Unger

customer_reviews.title: ... put these on a Polaris Ranger and I’m very satisfied. The price was good and they weren’t hard ...
customer_reviews.text: I put these on a Polaris Ranger and I’m very satisfied. The price was good and they weren’t hard to mount although I mounted these in hot July and they might be difficult to bead in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: 7 BAR

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews and the price was really much lower than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Look awesome on the rear of my yamaha 225 three wheeler.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jachowicz

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for zero turn mower
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace the turf tires on my john deere 997. They arent too aggressive yet they have considerably more traction laterally as well as forward than the stock turf tires. On the john deere wheels 9-10" wide they measured right at 25" tall. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I Put 4 on my honda 300fw and took it ice fishing. Hauled 2 men, steel utility sled ,2man flip over sled and all our gear across Schroon lake with 6" of wet snow on top without any issues. Probably gonna buy 2 more for my other atv
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Undecided about tires for your ATV? Purchase Kendra Bear Claw
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of the Kendra K299 Bear Claw tires, 24x11x10, and installed them on my Kawasaki Mule. I couldn't have selected a better tire than these! I was surprised how well the tires performed on dirt roads, muddy terrians and driving on asphalt in my neighborhood. Smooth and quite ride for this type of tire! Great price as well! I highly recommend these tires to anyone for their ATV or UTV!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and great look!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and they look great on. I had two worn out tires (didnt realize they were that worn out until I put these bad boys on). They look beefy and they are great tires. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jazzyj

customer_reviews.title: A serious tire
customer_reviews.text: This is a very tough tire. I put them on the front of a John Deere Gator. They were a little hard to mount, but sitting them in the sun for an hour really makes them seat easily. I considered having them foam filled but they are so stiff that I cannot tell when they are low or flat. I have a tough environment for tires....mesquite thorns. This is one of the few 6 ply tires this size that I could find and the first set of tire I have found that work here. I highly recommend these for tough environments....
customer_reviews.author: Canary Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Over all good tire. Good for trails and utility. Not a super mud tire but good all around.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gregory

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for the hilly heavily forested terrain I use them in. Climbs over logs like a goat.
customer_reviews.author: R. W.

customer_reviews.title: Look Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: They look awesome on my 2012 Suzuki Ozark and ride great! Appear to be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Best tire for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY reason to pay MORE for a tire is to falsely believe you are getting MORE for your money! This tire came as described, shipped fast, fit my 4 wheeler perfectly, & has great gripping power. Go ahead & blow money on a BIG name, I will use my savings on other 4 wheeler accessories. PLY RATING> PLY RATING: 6PR TL
customer_reviews.author: giftcard

customer_reviews.title: good traction
customer_reviews.text: Work good on my ranger,very good traction on dry ground and loose dirt, haven't tried in deep or soupy mud. There's a lot of spacing between the treads for something to cut or puncture the tire. I have a older set of these on my Kodiak and the tread seem much thicker. all in all a good tire for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gcl

customer_reviews.title: A tire machine makes installation easy.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. They provide excellent traction for the wet Alaska conditions. I’ll be purchasing another set for my other ATV.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Parks

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking tires
customer_reviews.text: These are a great looking tire at a reasonable price and shipping is fast. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TIRES
customer_reviews.text: RECEIVED THE TIRES QUICKLY AND THEY ARE THE BOOM... THIS IS THE SECOND SET OF KENDA TIRES AND THEY LAST A LONG TIME AS THERE ARE TIMES WHEN I RIDE ON PAVEMENT. THEY HOLD UP FANTASTIC AND ARE A GREAT VALUE. BUY THEM YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!!
customer_reviews.author: ❤️OUR COUNTRY🇺🇸

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of these for the front of my Honda 300 TRX and love them. They are a beefy well made tire ...
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat this tire for the price. I bought 2 of these for the front of my Honda 300 TRX and love them. They are a beefy well made tire and I plan on buying the same tires for the rear very soon. I would definitely recommend this tire to anybody that is considering buying some.
customer_reviews.author: JGR

customer_reviews.title: and they look and perform SUPER awesome compared to the factory tires
customer_reviews.text: Put these on a 2009 Polaris Ranger Crew, and they look and perform SUPER awesome compared to the factory tires. Much more aggressive tread without being all super swamper-y. Run good on pavement as well as gumbo. Highly rated.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Tires are great
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased Kenda Bears for the back of my Polaris crew, so this time I purchased fronts and am equally happy
customer_reviews.author: James S. Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Really good tire durable and grips well. Tire shop had a bit of a struggle getting one to mount but eventually got it to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hoard

customer_reviews.title: These tires work great!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my 08 Polaris Sportsman and they work just great! The way they were shaped when they arrived at my door was a little suspect, but they straightened out and installed easy enough. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BarryD

customer_reviews.title: TV TIRES
customer_reviews.text: I just got a set of these for the front of my Honda Rancher ES. They look great. I have plowed some snow with them on and they have great traction. Not sure how long they will last but as four-wheeler tires go, they will probably last as long as any of them. Five stars so far but time will be the real test.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: True story
customer_reviews.text: Last time I wrote a review evidently I wasn’t qualified according to Amazon..... from whom I have ordered thousands of dollars from in the very recent past.... so ok I will play along and say these tires work very well
customer_reviews.author: don koon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tire for our Polaris Ranger. It was the correct size and we like the aggressive tread. It shipped very quickly. When I called the Kenda company to ask a few questions their contact person was very friendly and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Laccia

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: At the time we purchased these the price was excellent. Even the ATV dealer admitted they couldn't buy them for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small for size.
customer_reviews.text: The size is smaller than expected compared to other brands. Also the tread is not very deep. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: GmanFranco

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great tire for winter ice and snow. Will use atv for ice fishing and plowing. Tire not good on blacktop or concrete. Made for off road use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on an all wheel drive Yamaha quad, I also put another set on a Polaris 500 x2. They work fine, grip well as they should, but if you are a die hard mud bogger you should probably go with a deeper tread, the tread height is not agresive enough for extreme mudding, but a great all around tire!
customer_reviews.author: dlhnova

customer_reviews.title: Would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Just replaced all four of my Razor tires with bear claws. Wow! I love these tires. Great all terrain tires. Good in deep sand, over rocks, though creeks and over geeks!
customer_reviews.author: rgb

customer_reviews.title: Good for ranch work
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my moms ranch 4x4 quad. She lives them says they’re good on the ranch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: work great. As in some other reviews they come collapsed ...
customer_reviews.text: Used them in snow and mud, work great. As in some other reviews they come collapsed and could be difficult to mount. We put inner tubes in them and inflated them and left over night, removed tubes and then they were easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aggressive!
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for a good price. Good side lugs for crawling. Wouldn't buy any other tire. Just don't ride across your wife's lawn with these, they will shred the grass even when barely moving...learn from me! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tire! Strong 6 ply construction. Very grippy in the mud!
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Tire size is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The front tires were true to size. 25x8x12,( 8 being the width), however, the rear tires (25x10x12) are less than 9 inches wide and maybe 23 inches tall. My last set of tires were 11's and actually 11 inches wide. WTF
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tire
customer_reviews.text: This tire is so much better than oem that came on the Ranger. Great traction and ride is so much better now.
customer_reviews.author: gl1800red

customer_reviews.title: Like I said
customer_reviews.text: Just put the tires on. They are directional so you have to make sure they are put on correctly. They have serious aggressive tread. Like I said, I just put them on so I can't say much either way on reliability
customer_reviews.author: Josh Carty

customer_reviews.title: Great rear tires for Bayou 300 2 wheel drive
customer_reviews.text: Great rear tires for Bayou 300 2 wheel drive. fit stock rims. Took all 2 rear tires and front tires to Discount tire and they mounted them and replaced stems.
customer_reviews.author: GLM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tire
customer_reviews.text: Very good tires. This is second 4-wheeler to put these on. They will shred your grass, so tread lightly around the house. Sidewall lugs are a definite benefit. Hold up very well to family trail riding.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my old Honda 4trax on time delivery great price
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is very aggressive works well. As soon as you receive them cut the bands and get him out into the Sun so they can warm up before taking them to be installed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris DeSena

customer_reviews.title: Great tires so far
customer_reviews.text: Great tires so far. Put them to the test at a local ATV park. These tires pulled my RZR 900s thru the rock, sand, and mud trails with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Mehring

customer_reviews.title: These are great tires for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great tires for the price. Saved enough online to have them mounted at local tire shop and still be under what they quoted. I would rather by tires locally, but sometimes shopping online leaves more in the bank.
customer_reviews.author: BigT6512

customer_reviews.title: great tire
customer_reviews.text: this tire looked like it was going to be a heavy duty tire but I bought them anyway because it was a great price and I will tell you that my 4 wheeler runs so nice with these new tires I would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Glenn W

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome on my golf cart
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome on my golf cart! great tires, haven't had it stuck yet, not even in 10" of heavy wet snow.
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: The tires arrived and they were all they said in the advertisement. I needed a new pair for my 4 wheeler and these appear at least for now to fit the bill. In the next few days I'll be putting on at least 150 miles on them and we'll gauge their performance after that....I may even buy another set after that for the back!
customer_reviews.author: Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire.
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of these on the back of my golf cart and ordered another for the front. These tires have plenty of traction in the snow. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect load rating in add
customer_reviews.text: Amazon states tire load rating is 69 which means there able to handle 717lbs.When I got tire it says on sidewall good for 408 lbs.False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Z.

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: The old tires were 4 ply these are 6 ply. The ride is a little stiffer but the traction is very good
customer_reviews.author: Michael Noland

product_meta.title: Kenda Bearclaw K299 ATV Tire - 25X8.00-12
product_meta.description: Size:25X8.00-126-ply-rated extra tough casting to resist punctures.
feature_bullets: Tire only; rim sold separately; non-highway use only
The Kenda Bearclaw features angled knobs to do dig into the terrain for maximum traction and a 6-ply rated extra-tough casing to resist punctures
The center lugs provide extra traction and better control; the built-in rim guard protects your wheel from dings and dents

specifications.Special Features: Sold Each TIRE ONLY, NO Rim!!!!
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars683 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
